external_references.description: Insikt Group. (2020, July 28). CHINESE STATE-SPONSORED GROUP ‘REDDELTA’ TARGETS THE VATICAN AND CATHOLIC ORGANIZATIONS. Retrieved April 13, 2021.

description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has used names like `adobeupdate.dat` and `PotPlayerDB.dat` to disguise [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013), and a file named `OneDrive.exe` to load a [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) payload.(Citation: Recorded Future REDDELTA July 2020)
